typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Age as integer,
		Education as string,
		Salary as integer,
		Occupation as string,
		DOB as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceData
SourceData split(toDate(DOB, 'yyyy-mm-dd'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ErrorDataTransform@(ErrorRows, CorrectData)
